arts.ttl: Cristiano Ronaldo drops 9-word message to teammates after Al Nassr’s upset loss to Al Qadisiya in SPL title race
arts.sum: After the upsetting 2-1 loss against Al Qadisiya in the Saudi Pro League title race, Cristiano Ronaldo made a 9-word message to his Al Nassr teammates.

arts.ttl: Cristiano Ronaldo shows a side fans never see in tender video Georgina Rodríguez shared for their daughter birthday
arts.sum: But in a tender video shared by Georgina Rodríguez to celebrate their daughter's third birthday, fans got a completely different view of the man known worldwide as CR7 . The video shows Ronaldo sitting across the table from his daughter, joking with her, mimicking her expressions, and laughing in a way fans rarely see.

arts.ttl: Photo: All smiles as Cristiano Ronaldo reunites with former Real Madrid teammate in Saudi Arabia
arts.sum: A photo which is no doubt set to bring a collective smile to the faces of Real Madrid supporters the world over has on Friday surfaced online. This comes with…

arts.ttl: Saudi Pro League 2024-25: Al Qadsiah’s Aubameyang scores late winner to dent Al Nassr’s title chances
arts.sum: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang’s late winner ensured all three points for Al Qadsiah as it beat Al Nassr 2-1 in the Saudi Pro League at the Prince Mohamed bin Fahd Stadium on Friday.

arts.ttl: Moises Caicedo to Al-Nassr: Should Chelsea cash in on record signing?
arts.sum: Moises Caicedo to Al-Nassr: Should Chelsea cash in on record signing? Chelsea have no intention of engaging with Al-Nassr's interest in Moises Caicedo, and this is the correct decision.

arts.ttl: Doting dad Cristiano Ronaldo shows his softer side as footballer playfully celebrates daughter's 3rd birthday with heartwarming Instagram post
arts.sum: Cristiano Ronaldo has taken to social media to celebrate the third birthday of his daughter Bella. He posted a picture of the pair embraced in a hug together on Instagram to mark the occasion.

arts.ttl: 'Here's why I really left Real Madrid after Cristiano Ronaldo was blamed for my exit'
arts.sum: Rafael Benitez endured a tough time when he took charge of Real Madrid in 2015, but he has insisted that rumours surrounding his departure are not to be believed

arts.ttl: Cristiano Ronaldo nears decision on Al Nassr future amid contract talks
arts.sum: Cristiano Ronaldo looks set to extend his career well into his forties, with a new contract at Saudi Pro League club Al Nassr thought to be close.
